name: Firedump
tagline: mysql backup...and even more .net desktop app
body:
# firedump
#### Ergasia gia ADOPSE ======== Download and check this http://mysqlbackupftp.com/ (it will be our guide!)
after downloading and installing vs 2015 install this,in options choose all
http://system.data.sqlite.org/downloads/1.0.103.0/sqlite-netFx46-setup-bundle-x86-2015-1.0.103.0.exe

otan einai neo clone sto visual studio 2015 xriazete afto gia na traviksei ta references apo nuget
Visual studio 2015 -> Tools->Nuget Package Manager->Package Manager Console Nuget reinstall Command:
Update-Package â€“reinstall
Avraam Piperidis
Valantis Pitsas
Chenyang Ji

mysqlftp backup .net desktop app
